PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-03562019-04-15,  ,  ,  ,  IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of PAULA LYNNE THOMPSON of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Ottawa District Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and her designation as Deputy Chairperson of the Refugee Appeal Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board.
